known_issues: Game has many glitches/bugs that need fixing

existing_features.title: Fix Snake Arena movement/physics glitches by correcting the snake segment follow logic so segments track the previous segment smoothly (no jittering, teleporting, or kinks) during normal play, turning, and world-edge wrap-around.

Tune the default player snake speed so it is reliably “medium” (not too fast and not too slow) across different device frame rates by adjusting the snake speed constants and/or delta-time scaling in the Snake Arena loop.

Fix gameplay glitches related to pickup generation and collection consistency by ensuring pickup IDs are unique and that pickups do not flicker, duplicate unexpectedly, or reappear due to identifier collisions or state update issues.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust snake speed (currently medium; user wants different/faster speed)

projectName: Fix Snake Arena glitches and tune default snake speed to medium
